WEBINAR RECORDING: How to develop your marketing and grow your business.

15 MINUTE WEBINAR: How to Develop your Marketing and Grow your Business

A flexible approach to small business software and technology marketing that will maximise your success.

In this session you will hear how to:

  • Find more prospects, by investing in and developing your marketing
  • Get access to a full range of marketing services and experts
  • AND Select only the right marketing activity to suit your business needs and stage
  • Address typical varied challenges faced by smaller software and technology companies
  • Change your approach when you need to, flex your budget up or down
  • Plus much moreâ€¦

LISTEN TO THE WEBINAR RECORDING 

Please complete the short form below and we will email you a link to the webinar recording. 

PRESENTER

Terry Forsey, Software & Technology, Sales and Marketing Professional

Software and technology industry veteran, a trustee of the Travis Foundation, inspirer and influencer. Terry set up a specialist UK consultancy in 2001, to help smaller software and technology businesses run successful sales and marketing campaigns, and to take advantage of online marketing to grow sales and profits!
